interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Max Payne
Review Date: 2022/04/10
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Dark
Product Description: ['HD. Mark Wahlberg is a loner cop bent on avenging the murders of his wife and child in this stylish adaptation of the popular video game.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'Español'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'Español (España)', 'Español (México)'], 'Directors': ['John Moore'], 'Producers': ['Julie Yorn', 'Scott Faye', 'John Moore'], 'Starring': ['Mark Wahlberg', 'Mila Kunis', 'Beau Bridges']}
Review Text: The movie was ok, but I never got to see the end.  I ran out of time I guess and then the movie was removed to rent or watch and now it just sits there showing the want to rewatch, but you can't and you can't get it removed.  Technical glitch
Review Title: Movie was ok
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

My new favorite show
The Good Wife
Drama
['Pushing aside the betrayal and crushing public humiliation caused by her husband, Peter, Alicia Florrick starts over by pursuing her original career as a defense attorney.  As a junior associate at a prestigious Chicago law firm, she joins her longtime friend, former law school classmate and firm partner Will Gardner, who is interested in rekindling their former relationship.']

another great season, story lines keep you interested without bogging you down each episode, can't wait to start watching season 3

Jack Reacher
